item.title: Devolver Digital and Kenny Sun announce BALL x PIT
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/devolver-digital-and-kenny-sun-announce-ball-x-pit

Full reveal set for Summer Game Fest 2025 Showcase.

Publisher Devolver Digital and Mr. Hat’s Sunbox developer Kenny Sun will reveal new title BALL x PIT as part of Summer Game Fest 2025 on June 6 at 5:00 p.m. PT / 8:00 p.m. ET, the companies announced. You will be able to watch the reveal on YouTube and Twitch. Platforms, release information, and details were not announced.

“The BALL x PIT showcase [BALL x PIT: The Kenny Sun Story] will reveal a tremendous new title that the Devolver Digital team themselves can’t even put down—hundreds of hours later,” reads the press release.

For the time being, interested users can follow BALL x PIT via Twitter, Bluesky, TikTok, Reddit, and Discord.
